title: Noetics 101 - Energy Healing - IONS
description: Ancient and indigenous healing practices use "subtle energy" to support the health and well-being of individuals and their communities
cleaned_text: Across the globe, ancient and indigenous healing practices use "subtle energy" to support the health and well-being of individuals and their communities. Sometimes called qi, prana, etheric energy, mana, life force, or homeopathic resonance, many people believe this energy gives us the power to heal ourselves and others. There is a growing body of research that supports this belief. Yet energy healing is a challenging phenomenon to study. Scientists often disagree about what subtle energy is, how it functions, or how it might support health and healing. What is the nature of this invisible force?
